article_title: Macon-based nursing home CEO ‘stunned’ after feds ask Georgia to return Medicaid payments
article_text: A health care company CEO says he was “speechless and stunned” when the feds asked Georgia to return more than $100 million in payments made to his firm’s nursing homes.

article_metadata.title: Macon-based nursing home CEO ‘stunned’ after feds ask Georgia to return Medicaid payments | The Telegraph
